content.author: Definition of 'happiness' by J
content.quote: The full use of your powers along lines of excellence.

content.author: H. H. Munro
content.quote: He is one of those people who would be enormously improved by death.

content.author: Samuel Johnson
content.quote: The true measure of a man is how he treats someone who can do him absolutely no good.

content.author: John F. Kennedy
content.quote: I think 'Hail to the Chief' has a nice ring to it.

content.author: Ian L. Fleming
content.quote: I shall not waste my days in trying to prolong them.

content.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton
content.quote: You can only find truth with logic if you have already found truth without it.

content.author: Friedrich Nietzsche
content.quote: He who has a 'why' to live, can bear with almost any 'how'.

content.author: General George S. Patton
content.quote: If a man does his best, what else is there?

content.author: Jimmy Durante
content.quote: Be nice to people on your way up because you meet them on your way down.

content.author: Aldous Huxley
content.quote: Maybe this world is another planet's Hell.
